full_summary:
### Counter Uncrewed Aircraft System (UAS) Dismounted - Request for Proposal

#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number:** W8476-236684/B
* **Publication Date:** 19 June 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** 3 August 2023, 14:00:00
* **Amendment Number:** 2

#### Project Description

The Canadian government is seeking proposals to procure Counter Uncrewed Aircraft System (UAS) Dismounted systems. The proposed systems will be designed to counter UAS threats in various directions as follows:

* **Line 1:** Dismounted Directional Counter UAS
* **Line 2:** Dismounted Omni-Directional Counter UAS
* **Line 3:** Dismounted Fixed Site Counter UAS

The successful bidder will be expected to deliver the Counter UAS Dismounted system(s) to the Department of National Defence, specifically at the locations stipulated in the contracting documents.

#### Tendering Information

* **Trade Agreement:** None
* **Tendering Procedures:** Open bidding to all interested suppliers
* **Competitive Procurement Strategy:** Lowest/Lower Bid
* **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement:** No

#### Additional Information

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity:** Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Langdon (bm div), Darren
* **Contact Email:** darren.langdon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** (819) 639-3772

Please note: The contract documents are available on the [Canada Buys website](http://canadabuys.canada.ca). [1](# fn1)
